headline: Now, thinking about the CSV format. The first row needs to be the header: "headline"
author: author
content: content. Each subsequent row represents one article with these four fields enclosed in double quotes and separated by semicolons. If any field is missing, I replace it with "NA".

headline: New Technology Breakthrough in Renewable Energy

content: In a groundbreaking development, researchers have unveiled a new material that significantly enhances solar panel efficiency...
